<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands">ARMConstantIslands</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands">ARMConstantIslands</a> - Due to limited PC-relative displacements, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm">ARM</a> requires constant pool entries to be scattered among the instructions inside a function. <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands/cpuser">CPUser</a></>}>
CPUser - One user of a constant pool, keeping the machine instruction pointer, the constant pool being referenced, and the max displacement allowed from the instruction to the CP. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands/cpuser/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands/cpentry">CPEntry</a></>}>
CPEntry - One per constant pool entry, keeping the machine instruction pointer, the constpool index, and the number of CPUser&#39;s which reference this entry. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands/cpentry/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands/immbranch">ImmBranch</a></>}>
ImmBranch - One per immediate branch, keeping the machine instruction pointer, conditional or unconditional, the max displacement, and (if isCond is true) the corresponding unconditional branch opcode. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands/immbranch/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

### jumpTableFollowsTB() {#a22895e7a8fa9fc2f5a3306dd7aebbb33}

  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns whether CPEMI is the first instruction in the block immediately following JTMI (assumed to be a TBB or TBH terminator).

If so, we can switch the first register to PC and usually remove the address calculation that preceded it.

<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-armconstantislandpass-cpp-"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// ARMConstantIslands - Due to limited PC-relative displacements, ARM</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// requires constant pool entries to be scattered among the instructions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// inside a function.  To do this, it completely ignores the normal LLVM</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// constant pool; instead, it places constants wherever it feels like with</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// special instructions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The terminology used in this pass includes:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   Islands - Clumps of constants placed in the function.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   Water   - Potential places where an island could be formed.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   CPE     - A constant pool entry that has been placed somewhere, which</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///             tracks a list of users.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands/#a6ab5453e9f3f4ed83c6bb9e4ebd68b20">ARMConstantIslands</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionpass/#a29c81d2386f4a727c6d33413807530c8">MachineFunctionPass</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;ARMBasicBlockUtils&gt; BBUtils = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// WaterList - A sorted list of basic blocks where islands could be placed</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// (i.e. blocks that don&#39;t fall through to the following block, due</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// to a return, unreachable, or unconditional branch).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;MachineBasicBlock&#42;&gt; WaterList;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// NewWaterList - The subset of WaterList that was created since the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// previous iteration by inserting unconditional branches.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet&lt;MachineBasicBlock&#42;, 4&gt;</a> NewWaterList;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">water&#95;iterator = std::vector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;&gt;::iterator;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// CPUser - One user of a constant pool, keeping the machine instruction</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// pointer, the constant pool being referenced, and the max displacement</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// allowed from the instruction to the CP.  The HighWaterMark records the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// highest basic block where a new CPEntry can be placed.  To ensure this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// pass terminates, the CP entries are initially placed at the end of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// function and then move monotonically to lower addresses.  The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// exception to this rule is when the current CP entry for a particular</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// CPUser is out of range, but there is another CP entry for the same</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// constant value in range.  We want to use the existing in-range CP</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// entry, but if it later moves out of range, the search for new water</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// should resume where it left off.  The HighWaterMark is used to record</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// that point.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">CPUser &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;CPEMI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;HighWaterMark;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxDisp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NegOk;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsSoImm;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> KnownAlignment = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">      CPUser(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;mi, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;cpemi, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> maxdisp,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad137f00752c91478230b01c851768605">neg</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> soimm)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">        : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>(mi), CPEMI(cpemi), MaxDisp(maxdisp), NegOk(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad137f00752c91478230b01c851768605">neg</a>), IsSoImm(soimm) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">        HighWaterMark = CPEMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a1e855100f407ca4be098d0050be403b0">getParent</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="comment">      /// getMaxDisp - Returns the maximum displacement supported by MI.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="comment">      /// Correct for unknown alignment.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="comment">      /// Conservatively subtract 2 bytes to handle weird alignment effects.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> getMaxDisp()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (KnownAlignment ? MaxDisp : MaxDisp - 2) - 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// CPUsers - Keep track of all of the machine instructions that use various</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">CPEntry &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// CPEntries - Keep track of all of the constant pool entry machine</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// instructions. For each original constpool index (i.e. those that existed</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// upon entry to this pass), it keeps a vector of entries.  Original</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// elements are cloned as we go along; the clones are put in the vector of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// the original element, but have distinct CPIs.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The first half of CPEntries contains generic constants, the second half</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// contains jump tables. Use getCombinedIndex on a generic CPEMI to look up</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// which vector it will be in here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;std::vector&lt;CPEntry&gt;&gt; CPEntries;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Perform the initial placement of the regular constant pool entries.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="comment">/// To start with, we put them all at the end of the function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal">ARMConstantIslands::doInitialConstPlacement(std::vector&lt;MachineInstr&#42;&gt; &amp;CPEMIs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create the basic block to hold the CPE&#39;s.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MachineConstantPool measures alignment in bytes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> MaxAlign = MCP-&gt;getConstantPoolAlign();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxLogAlign = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad82de9da62635df78a534de0f16c1129">Log2</a>(MaxAlign);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mark the basic block as required by the const-pool.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><Highlight kind="normal">  BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a8cb665c210dc8e43f537cf4c9b84e2c7">setAlignment</a>(MaxAlign);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The function needs to be as aligned as the basic blocks. The linker may</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// move functions around based on their alignment.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Special case: halfword literals still need word alignment on the function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> FuncAlign = MaxAlign;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MaxAlign == 2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="normal">    FuncAlign = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(4);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><Highlight kind="normal">  MF-&gt;ensureAlignment(FuncAlign);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Order the entries in BB by descending alignment.  That ensures correct</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// alignment of all entries as long as BB is sufficiently aligned.  Keep</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// track of the insertion point for each alignment.  We are going to bucket</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sort the entries as they are created.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineBasicBlock::iterator, 8&gt;</a> InsPoint(MaxLogAlign + 1,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                       BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add all of the constants from the constant pool to the end block, use an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><Highlight kind="normal">    NextBlockAlignment = NextBlock-&gt;getAlignment();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = U.CPEMI-&gt;getOperand(2).getImm();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CPEEnd = CPEOffset + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The CPE may be able to hide in the alignment padding before the next</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// block. It may also cause more padding to be required if it is more aligned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that the next block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CPEEnd &gt; NextBlockOffset) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><Highlight kind="normal">    Growth = CPEEnd - NextBlockOffset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the padding that would go at the end of the CPE to align the next</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"><Highlight kind="normal">    Growth += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a99cdcecbadc13087f087c61809bb44f1">offsetToAlignment</a>(CPEEnd, NextBlockAlignment);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the CPE is to be inserted before the instruction, that will raise</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the offset of the instruction. Also account for unknown alignment padding</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in blocks between CPE and the user.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CPEOffset &lt; UserOffset)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"><Highlight kind="normal">      UserOffset += Growth + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aca36878e37b708e22ace80dececead61">UnknownPadding</a>(MF-&gt;getAlignment(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad82de9da62635df78a534de0f16c1129">Log2</a>(CPEAlign));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// CPE fits in existing padding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><Highlight kind="normal">    Growth = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> isOffsetInRange(UserOffset, CPEOffset, U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><Highlight kind="comment">/// LookForCPEntryInRange - see if the currently referenced CPE is in range;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if not, see if an in-range clone of the CPE is in range, and if so,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><Highlight kind="comment">/// change the data structures so the user references the clone.  Returns:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 0 = no existing entry found</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1 = entry found, and there were no code insertions or deletions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2 = entry found, and there were code insertions or deletions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1240"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ARMConstantIslands::findInRangeCPEntry(CPUser&amp; U, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UserOffset) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;CPEMI  = U.CPEMI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;In range\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CPI = getCombinedIndex(CPEMI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;CPEntry&gt; &amp;CPEs = CPEntries&#91;CPI&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1298"><Highlight kind="comment">/// findAvailableWater - Look for an existing entry in the WaterList in which</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1299"><Highlight kind="comment">/// we can place the CPE referenced from U so it&#39;s within range of U&#39;s MI.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1300"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns true if found, false if not.  If it returns true, WaterIter</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1301"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is set to the WaterList entry.  For Thumb, prefer water that will not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1302"><Highlight kind="comment">/// introduce padding to water that will.  To ensure that this pass</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1303"><Highlight kind="comment">/// terminates, the CPE location for a particular CPUser is only allowed to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1304"><Highlight kind="comment">/// move to a lower address, so search backward from the end of the list and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1305"><Highlight kind="comment">/// prefer the first water that is in range.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1306"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ARMConstantIslands::findAvailableWater(CPUser &amp;U, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UserOffset,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1310"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1312"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BestGrowth = ~0<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea7b774effe4a349c6dd82ad4f4f21d34c">u</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The nearest water without splitting the UserBB is right after it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the distance is still large (we have a big BB), then we need to split it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1316"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// situation to converge:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1321"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When a CP access is out of range, BB0 may be used as water. However,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1322"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inserting islands between BB0 and BB1 makes other accesses out of range.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1323"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;UserBB = U.MI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acf6442108e21e7e5379feb8962de65b7">getParent</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1330"><Highlight kind="normal">       --IP) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1331"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a>&#42; WaterBB = &#42;IP;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if water is in range and is either at a lower address than the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// current &quot;high water mark&quot; or a new water block that was created since</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the previous iteration by inserting an unconditional branch.  In the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1335"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// latter case, we want to allow resetting the high water mark back to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1336"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this new water since we haven&#39;t seen it before.  Inserting branches</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sure to take advantage of it for all the CPEs near that block, so that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When CloserWater is true, we try to find the lowest address after (or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1349"><Highlight kind="normal">      WaterIter = IP;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1366"><Highlight kind="comment">/// createNewWater - No existing WaterList entry will work for</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the block does not end in an unconditional branch already, and if the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end of the block is within range, make new water there.  (The addition</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1386"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// below is for the unconditional branch we will be adding: 4 bytes on ARM +</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Thumb2, 2 on Thumb1.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipsconstantislandpass-cpp/#a2591f82337ce78f51703e6b3382eec3c">BBHasFallthrough</a>(UserMBB)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1389"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Size of branch to insert.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1390"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Delta = isThumb1 ? 2 : 4;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the offset where the CPE will begin.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CPEOffset = UserBBI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a96d35759d0115509c273fbdfd8fe011a">postOffset</a>(CPEAlign) + Delta;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1393"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (isOffsetInRange(UserOffset, CPEOffset, U)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1395"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Split at end of &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af7881286e3ea4d7f1c4a63c87c132dac">printMBBReference</a>(&#42;UserMBB)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1396"><Highlight kind="normal">                        &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a939bc2108d47080767f0c06ba56caec7">format</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;, expected CPE offset %#x\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, CPEOffset));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewMBB = &amp;&#42;++UserMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add an unconditional branch from UserMBB to fallthrough block.  Record</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it for branch lengthening; this new branch will not get out of range,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// but if the preceding conditional branch is out of range, the targets</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1401"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will be exchanged, and the altered branch may be out of range, so the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// machinery has to know about it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UncondBr = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armasmprinter-cpp/#ac74d5e6c2cf6e4a41c5cd533e7f88fad">isThumb</a> ? ((isThumb2) ? <Link id="l01404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1404"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armasmprinter-cpp/#ac74d5e6c2cf6e4a41c5cd533e7f88fad">isThumb</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1405"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(UserMBB, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker/#a463a58e257d5f6fb2c39eb9a2474fc24ac2e06fc138163b7095fa483616a0a47a">DebugLoc</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;get(UncondBr)).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#abf1febf2a98f588146548a3a485d3838">addMBB</a>(NewMBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxDisp = <a href="#a2e62a3c07e3b7d0f0591b2d80bd20967">getUnconditionalBrDisp</a>(UncondBr);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// What a big block.  Find a place within the block to split it.  This is a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// little tricky on Thumb1 since instructions are 2 bytes and constant pool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// entries are 4 bytes: if instruction I references island CPE, and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction I+1 references CPE&#39;, it will not work well to put CPE as far</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// forward as possible, since then CPE&#39; cannot immediately follow it (that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// location is 2 bytes farther away from I+1 than CPE was from I) and we&#39;d</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// need to create a new island.  So, we make a first guess, then walk through</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the instructions between the one currently being looked at and the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// possible insertion point, and make sure any other instructions that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reference CPEs will be able to use the same island area; if not, we back</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// up the insertion point.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to split the block so it&#39;s fully aligned.  Compute the latest split</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// point where we can add a 4-byte branch instruction, and then align to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Align which is the largest possible alignment in the function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> = MF-&gt;getAlignment();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> &gt;= CPEAlign &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Over-aligned constant pool entry&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits">KnownBits</a> = UserBBI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a5f264104cc3a87ed07dd196d281ccd2c">internalKnownBits</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UPad = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aca36878e37b708e22ace80dececead61">UnknownPadding</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits">KnownBits</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BaseInsertOffset = UserOffset + U.getMaxDisp() - UPad;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a939bc2108d47080767f0c06ba56caec7">format</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Split in middle of big block before %#x&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><Highlight kind="normal">                              BaseInsertOffset));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The 4 in the following is for the unconditional branch we&#39;ll be inserting</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (allows for long branch on Thumb1).  Alignment of the island is handled</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inside isOffsetInRange.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><Highlight kind="normal">  BaseInsertOffset -= 4;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a939bc2108d47080767f0c06ba56caec7">format</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;, adjusted to %#x&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, BaseInsertOffset)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; la=&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad82de9da62635df78a534de0f16c1129">Log2</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>) &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; kb=&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits">KnownBits</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; up=&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; UPad &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This could point off the end of the block if we&#39;ve already got constant</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pool entries following this block; only the last one is in the water list.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Back past any possible branches (allow for a conditional and a maximally</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// long unconditional).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BaseInsertOffset + 8 &gt;= UserBBI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a96d35759d0115509c273fbdfd8fe011a">postOffset</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ensure BaseInsertOffset is larger than the offset of the instruction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// following UserMI so that the loop which searches for the split point</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// iterates at least once.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><Highlight kind="normal">    BaseInsertOffset =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><Highlight kind="normal">        std::max(UserBBI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a96d35759d0115509c273fbdfd8fe011a">postOffset</a>() - UPad - 8,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><Highlight kind="normal">                 UserOffset + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getInstSizeInBytes(&#42;UserMI) + 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the CP is referenced(ie, UserOffset) is in first four instructions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1463"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// after IT, this recalculated BaseInsertOffset could be in the middle of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// an IT block. If it is, change the BaseInsertOffset to just after the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// IT block. This still make the CP Entry is in range becuase of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// following reasons.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   1 The initial BaseseInsertOffset calculated is (UserOffset +</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   U.getMaxDisp() - UPad).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   2 An IT block is only at most 4 instructions plus the &quot;it&quot; itself (18</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   bytes).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   3 All the relevant instructions support much larger Maximum</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   displacement.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = UserMI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><Highlight kind="normal">    ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> PredReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = UserOffset + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getInstSizeInBytes(&#42;UserMI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><Highlight kind="normal">         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getOpcode() != ARM::t2IT &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><Highlight kind="normal">         <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a665fdb3ba0c480903e8c1902f4d29e61">getITInstrPredicate</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, PredReg) != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/armcc/#ac8391dd6b8083baa870dee5142ff22b6a8b2ef77967dee1220cc6ee5aee595e11">ARMCC::AL</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><Highlight kind="normal">         <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getInstSizeInBytes(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = std::next(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"><Highlight kind="normal">      BaseInsertOffset =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><Highlight kind="normal">          std::max(BaseInsertOffset, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getInstSizeInBytes(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) + 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1550"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1551"><Highlight kind="comment">/// handleConstantPoolUser - Analyze the specified user, checking to see if it</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1552"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is out-of-range.  If so, pick up the constant pool value and move it some</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1553"><Highlight kind="comment">/// place in-range.  Return true if we changed any addresses (thus must run</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1554"><Highlight kind="comment">/// another pass of branch lengthening), false otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1555"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ARMConstantIslands::handleConstantPoolUser(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CPUserIndex,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1556"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CloserWater) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1557"><Highlight kind="normal">  CPUser &amp;U = CPUsers&#91;CPUserIndex&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1558"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;UserMI = U.MI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1559"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;CPEMI  = U.CPEMI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1560"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CPI = getCombinedIndex(CPEMI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1561"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = CPEMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(2).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a38b28a85f818b49d8806c150b8a5b4f7">getImm</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1562"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute this only once, it&#39;s expensive.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1563"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UserOffset = getUserOffset(U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1564"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1565"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// See if the current entry is within range, or there is a clone of it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1566"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in range.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1567"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> result = findInRangeCPEntry(U, UserOffset);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1568"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (result==1) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1569"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (result==2) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1570"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1571"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// No existing clone of this CPE is within range.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1572"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We will be generating a new clone.  Get a UID for it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1573"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> = AFI-&gt;createPICLabelUId();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1574"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1575"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Look for water where we can place this CPE.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1576"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;NewIsland = MF-&gt;CreateMachineBasicBlock();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1577"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;NewMBB;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1578"><Highlight kind="normal">  water&#95;iterator IP;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1579"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (findAvailableWater(U, UserOffset, IP, CloserWater)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1580"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Found water in range\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1581"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;WaterBB = &#42;IP;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1582"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1583"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the original WaterList entry was &quot;new water&quot; on this iteration,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1584"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// propagate that to the new island.  This is just keeping NewWaterList</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1585"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// updated to match the WaterList, which will be updated below.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1586"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NewWaterList.erase(WaterBB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1587"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewWaterList.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a3435a2381e60e842e915f85c931b7dde">insert</a>(NewIsland);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1588"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1589"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The new CPE goes before the following block (NewMBB).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1590"><Highlight kind="normal">    NewMBB = &amp;&#42;++WaterBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1591"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1592"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// No water found.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1593"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;No water found\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1594"><Highlight kind="normal">    createNewWater(CPUserIndex, UserOffset, NewMBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1595"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1596"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// splitBlockBeforeInstr adds to WaterList, which is important when it is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1597"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// called while handling branches so that the water will be seen on the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1598"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// next iteration for constant pools, but in this context, we don&#39;t want</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1599"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it.  Check for this so it will be removed from the WaterList.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1600"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Also remove any entry from NewWaterList.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1601"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;WaterBB = &amp;&#42;--NewMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1602"><Highlight kind="normal">    IP = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a086e9fbdb06276db7753101a08a63adf">find</a>(WaterList, WaterBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1603"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IP != WaterList.end())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1604"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewWaterList.erase(WaterBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1605"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1606"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We are adding new water.  Update NewWaterList.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1607"><Highlight kind="normal">    NewWaterList.insert(NewIsland);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1608"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1609"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Always align the new block because CP entries can be smaller than 4</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1610"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bytes. Be careful not to decrease the existing alignment, e.g. NewMBB may</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be an already aligned constant pool block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armasmprinter-cpp/#ac74d5e6c2cf6e4a41c5cd533e7f88fad">isThumb</a> ? <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(2) : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(4);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NewMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae13575403de0e7d005f1b5905053f3ea">getAlignment</a>() &lt; Alignment)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><Highlight kind="normal">    NewMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a8cb665c210dc8e43f537cf4c9b84e2c7">setAlignment</a>(Alignment);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Remove the original WaterList entry; we want subsequent insertions in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this vicinity to go after the one we&#39;re about to insert.  This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// considerably reduces the number of times we have to move the same CPE</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// more than once and is also important to ensure the algorithm terminates.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#acdfbcf188e2d4a80837e89de2ccdffab">if</a> (IP != WaterList.end())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><Highlight kind="normal">    WaterList.erase(IP);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Okay, we know we can put an island before NewMBB now, do it!</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><Highlight kind="normal">  MF-&gt;insert(NewMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>(), NewIsland);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update internal data structures to account for the newly inserted MBB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><Highlight kind="normal">  updateForInsertedWaterBlock(NewIsland);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1629"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now that we have an island to add the CPE to, clone the original CPE and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1630"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// add it to the island.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><Highlight kind="normal">  U.HighWaterMark = NewIsland;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1632"><Highlight kind="normal">  U.CPEMI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(NewIsland, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker/#a463a58e257d5f6fb2c39eb9a2474fc24ac2e06fc138163b7095fa483616a0a47a">DebugLoc</a>(), CPEMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a75a5f7e3b3d4ec79610b4e556d2f35ce">getDesc</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1637"><Highlight kind="normal">  ++NumCPEs;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1650"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO : UserMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a999b8f3e58e7ca479f26445bae791a7c">operands</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1658"><Highlight kind="normal">             &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a939bc2108d47080767f0c06ba56caec7">format</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; offset=%#x\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1664"><Highlight kind="comment">/// removeDeadCPEMI - Remove a dead constant pool entry instruction. Update</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1672"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// All succeeding offsets have the current size value added in, fix this.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1673"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CPEBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a095ce2d870dadf620a4c887ecc0efef8">empty</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
