<Link id="l01676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1676"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This block no longer needs to be aligned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1677"><Highlight kind="normal">    CPEBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a8cb665c210dc8e43f537cf4c9b84e2c7">setAlignment</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(1));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1678"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1679"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Entries are sorted by descending alignment, so realign from the front.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1680"><Highlight kind="normal">    CPEBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a8cb665c210dc8e43f537cf4c9b84e2c7">setAlignment</a>(getCPEAlign(&amp;&#42;CPEBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ab2d91e7bec944efcbc39d8e30644f111">begin</a>()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1681"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1683"><Highlight kind="normal">  BBUtils-&gt;adjustBBOffsetsAfter(CPEBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1684"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// An island has only one predecessor BB and one successor BB. Check if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1685"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this BB&#39;s predecessor jumps directly to this BB&#39;s successor. This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1686"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// shouldn&#39;t happen currently.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1687"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="#af6522321d1fc294742102bbee0779b62">BBIsJumpedOver</a>(CPEBB) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;How did this happen?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1688"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: remove the empty blocks after all the work is done?</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1689"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1904"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1905"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">: </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1906"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ARM::t2B:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1907"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewOpc = ARM::tB;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1908"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5a3c0710aa6b054662f67b480712fa2b95">Bits</a> = 11;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1909"><Highlight kind="normal">      Scale = 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1910"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1911"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ARM::t2Bcc:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1913"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5a3c0710aa6b054662f67b480712fa2b95">Bits</a> = 8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1914"><Highlight kind="normal">      Scale = 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1915"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1916"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1917"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NewOpc) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1918"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxOffs = ((1 &lt;&lt; (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5a3c0710aa6b054662f67b480712fa2b95">Bits</a>-1))-1) &#42; Scale;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1919"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;DestBB = Br.MI-&gt;getOperand(0).getMBB();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1920"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BBUtils-&gt;isBBInRange(Br.MI, DestBB, MaxOffs)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1992"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// target of Br. So now we need to reverse the condition.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1993"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86/#a86730e94ae6fdf0fe3145b2acc88dea8ac9b4c62f6dc1bc5caf3c768b687cbf7e">Cmp</a>.NewOpc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86/#a86730e94ae6fdf0fe3145b2acc88dea8ac9b4c62f6dc1bc5caf3c768b687cbf7e">Cmp</a>.NewOpc == ARM::tCBZ ? <Link id="l02005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2005"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MadeChange = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2006"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2007"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The order in which branches appear in ImmBranches is approximately their</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2008"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order within the function body. By visiting later branches first, we reduce</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2009"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the distance between earlier forward branches and their targets, making it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2010"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// more likely that the cbn?z optimization, which can only apply to forward</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2011"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// branches, will succeed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2012"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ImmBranch &amp;Br : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">reverse</a>(ImmBranches)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2013"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;DestBB = Br.MI-&gt;getOperand(0).getMBB();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2014"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> = Br.MI-&gt;getParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2015"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;ExitBB = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;back() == Br.MI ?</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2016"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;getFallThrough() :</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2017"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;back().getOperand(0).getMBB();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2094"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2095"><Highlight kind="comment">/// While trying to form a TBB/TBH instruction, we may (if the table</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2096"><Highlight kind="comment">/// doesn&#39;t immediately follow the BR&#95;JT) need access to the start of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2097"><Highlight kind="comment">/// jump-table. We know one instruction that produces such a register; this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2098"><Highlight kind="comment">/// function works out whether that definition can be preserved to the BR&#95;JT,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2099"><Highlight kind="comment">/// possibly by removing an intervening addition (which is usually needed to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2100"><Highlight kind="comment">/// calculate the actual entry to jump to).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2101"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ARMConstantIslands::preserveBaseRegister(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;JumpMI,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2102"><Highlight kind="normal">                                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;LEAMI,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2103"><Highlight kind="normal">                                              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;DeadSize,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2104"><Highlight kind="normal">                                              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;CanDeleteLEA,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2105"><Highlight kind="normal">                                              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;BaseRegKill) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2106"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (JumpMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a1e855100f407ca4be098d0050be403b0">getParent</a>() != LEAMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a1e855100f407ca4be098d0050be403b0">getParent</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2107"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2108"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2109"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now we hope that we have at least these instructions in the basic block:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2110"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     BaseReg = t2LEA ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2111"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     &#91;...&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2112"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     EntryReg = t2ADDrs BaseReg, ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2113"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     &#91;...&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2114"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     t2BR&#95;JT EntryReg</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2115"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2116"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We have to be very conservative about what we recognise here though. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2117"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// main perturbing factors to watch out for are:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2118"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    + Spills at any point in the chain: not direct problems but we would</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2119"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      expect a blocking Def of the spilled register so in practice what we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2120"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      can do is limited.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2121"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    + EntryReg == BaseReg: this is the one situation we should allow a Def</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2122"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      of BaseReg, but only if the t2ADDrs can be removed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2123"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    + Some instruction other than t2ADDrs computing the entry. Not seen in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2124"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      the wild, but we should be careful.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2125"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> EntryReg = JumpMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(0).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2126"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> BaseReg = LEAMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(0).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2127"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2128"><Highlight kind="normal">  CanDeleteLEA = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
